name: Poly Quest - VR Adventure Game
description:
A fantastic VR adventure awaits you with this low poly dungeon quest. Explore 6 environments and fight your way through angry skeletons, goblins, shamans, ghosts, golems and more. 

Solve puzzles, collect crystals and challenge your friends to get the best score. 

ArcadiaXR is providing this premium game free for all to enjoy.

Please note: Unzip the project and launch the EXE from the project folder. Moving the EXE out of this folder may result in unmatched controller bindings.
